alert.note: Alert for Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 7:49PM CST until December 15 at 8:15PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Olmsted County in southeastern Minnesota... * Until 815 PM CST. * At 749 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Stewartville, or 7 miles southeast of Rochester, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Eyota around 755 PM CST. Elgin around 800 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Chester, Pleasant Grove, Predmore, Carley State Park, Potsdam, Marion and Viola. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 211 and 222. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
